name: The Smurfs
overview: Gargamel has already captured three Smurfs. Smurf to their rescue! Smurf down the mountains riding on a sledge, explore the labyrinths of the mine, travel on the back of a stork... but beware of nasty enemies such as the Buzz flies, the Angry Smurfs, the Howlibird, Azrael and... Gargamel!
